traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

traits.name: Rune-Tattooed
traits.desc: Whenever Oregg casts a spell of 1st level or higher, he gains a number of temporary hit points equal to Xd10, where X is the level of the spell.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Oregg Steeltwister is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following sorcerer spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): firebolt, message, poison spray, true strike * 1st level (4 slots): magic missile, shield * 2nd level (3 slots): heat metal * 3rd level (2 slots): fly, fireball

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Oregg makes two longsword attacks and can cast a cantrip as a bonus action.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Firebolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Poison Spray
actions.desc: One creature within 10 feet of Oregg must make a successful DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12) poison damage.
